title: IFoldsFeatureData.IGetBends
description: Gets the bend features for this fold feature.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of bend features of this fold feature VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
